ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank our many colleagues at the BC Centre for Excellence in HIV/AIDS, particularly the clinical laboratory, bioinformatics pipeline, and Drug Treatment Program teams. We would also like to thank P. Richard Harrigan for his contributions to the laboratory and study inception. All inferences, opinions, and conclusions drawn in this paper are those of the authors, and do not reflect the opinions of the funders.
